content.raw: A nitpick you can choose to ignore: Is it possible to make the white space above and below the gray line equal? You could move it down a bit so it's closer to the button. Also, the line could be shorter by an inch or so on each side. :)
content.html: A nitpick you can choose to ignore: Is it possible to make the white space above and below the gray line equal? You could move it down a bit so it's closer to the button. Also, the line could be shorter by an inch or so on each side. :)
